SAMRAI::hier::MultiblockBoxTree

Utility sorting Boxes into tree-like form for finding box overlaps. Boxes are sorted by BlockId and then a BoxTree is constructed for each block in a BoxContainer. More...

class BoxContainer

Detailed Description

Utility sorting Boxes into tree-like form for finding box overlaps. Boxes are sorted by BlockId and then a BoxTree is constructed for each block in a BoxContainer.

Except for a destructor needed by boost shared_ptr, the entire interface is private. This class is intended to be only used by BoxContainer, which is made a friend class.
